name: The Creature Zone VR: Nightfall
description:
The Creature Zone's Origins Will Be Revealed...

In This Sequel/Prequel Game To The Creature Zone VR and The Slothgate Experiment Games, Eddy Miles Is Sent On A Mission By The Creature Zone Department Of Science, Where He Will Travel Back To The Locations And Times Of 3 Infamous Incidents, The First Terry's Pizzeria Murder, The Extraterrestrial Massacre On Camp Clearwater, And The Starvation Of A Kid In The Vents Of Terry's Pizzeria. You Will Use What You Got To Defend And Survive. Will You Make It Out Alive, Or Will You Be Another Cadaver In The Science Lab's Morgue? This Is A Very Physics-Heavy Horror Game, With Some Great VR Arms For $0!

This Game Will Feature:
~ Slow-Motion
~ Realistic VR Arms
~ Backpack Inventory
~ Climbable Ropes
~ And Much More!

This Game Is Expected To Release August 11th, 2023!

For More Updates, Follow Our Twitter.

Beware! This Game Is Meant For People Who Don't Get Too Motion Sick In VR! So Be Careful.
